strapiPost.title: Northwest Arkansas Schools Lead State In Niche Rankings
strapiPost.content:
Multiple schools across Northwest Arkansas have earned top ranks in Niche's 2023 school rankings, adding to the reasons NWA is one of the best places to live.

  • Public: In public education, Haas Hall ranked #2 in the state, and Bentonville High School was #5. Eight of Arkansas's top ten public high schools are in Northwest Arkansas, each making the list for their college prep, STEM programs, diversity, and excellent teachers. 
  • Private: Niche named Bentonville's Thaden School the best private school in Arkansas for its excellent academics, diversity, teachers, student activities, and college prep.

See where your school ranked on Niche's 2023 Best Schools HERE.
